Non_Functional_Requirement: Response time: Chatbot responses within 2 seconds for 95% of queries
Data security: End-to-end encryption (AES-256) for all user data at rest and in transit
Privacy compliance: GDPR, CCPA, and Ghana data protection act compliance
Availability: 99.9% uptime (minimum 43 seconds downtime per month)
Mobile compatibility: Support Android 8.0+, iOS 14.0+, responsive web browser
Accessibility compliance: WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards for all interfaces
App size: Mobile app ≤ 100MB for easy download on limited data plans
Offline functionality: 90% of core features work without internet connection
Scalability: Handle 10,000+ concurrent users without performance degradation
Load time: App launch within 3 seconds on 4G networks
Memory usage: App uses ≤ 150MB RAM during normal operation
Data anonymization: User identities masked after 90 days of inactivity
Localization: Support for 4+ local languages with cultural adaptation
Battery efficiency: App consumes ≤ 5% battery per hour of use
Network optimization: Works on 2G/3G networks with reduced feature set
Database performance: Query response time ≤ 500ms for 99% of requests
Disaster recovery: Recovery Time Objective (RTO) ≤ 1 hour
Backup frequency: Daily automated backups with geo-redundancy
User session management: Auto-logout after 15 minutes of inactivity
Content update: Deploy content updates within 2 hours of approval
API rate limiting: Prevent abuse with intelligent rate limiting
Error logging: Comprehensive logging with automatic error reporting
Version control: Maintain backward compatibility for 2 previous app versions
User documentation: In-app help, FAQs, and tutorial videos
Analytics: Real-time usage analytics dashboard with user insights
A/B testing: Support for feature flag testing and experimentation
Multi-device sync: Seamless experience across devices (Phase 2)
Performance monitoring: Real-time APM (Application Performance Monitoring)
Internationalization: Support for future language additions
Compliance audit trail: Maintain detailed logs for compliance verification
